kpi.name: sgsn_2105a
kpi.formula: (sesmgmnt.SUCC_PDP_MODIFY_BY_MS + sesmgmnt.FAIL_PDP_MODIFY_BY_MS + sesmgmnt.SUCC_PDP_MODIFY_BY_SGSN + sesmgmnt.FAIL_PDP_MODIFY_BY_SGSN + sesmgmnt.SUCC_PDP_MODIFY_BY_GGSN + sesmgmnt.FAIL_PDP_MODIFY_BY_GGSN + sesmgmnt.SUCC_PDP_MODIFY_BY_BSS + sesmgmnt.FAIL_PDP_MODIFY_BY_BSS)

kpi_info.title: Gb PDP context modification attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the total amount of PDP context modification procedure attempts from Gb interface.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(SUCC_PDP_MODIFY_BY_MS +
FAIL_PDP_MODIFY_BY_MS +
SUCC_PDP_MODIFY_BY_SGSN +
FAIL_PDP_MODIFY_BY_SGSN +
SUCC_PDP_MODIFY_BY_GGSN +
FAIL_PDP_MODIFY_BY_GGSN +
SUCC_PDP_MODIFY_BY_BSS +
FAIL_PDP_MODIFY_BY_BSS)
